snippet.title: Elette Trailer
snippet.description:
After the events of the Reaper Wars, Lotte had become a shattered nation. Under the rule of Mathias, the citizens managed to rebuild some of their once proud nation. After years of reconstruction, the island nation of Lotte is soon threatened by a darker, more vile threat; one that had been sleeping since the Reaper Wars. Take control of Mathias as he fights for his life against the invading horde in Elette, the haunted tower defense game!

https://theindieaccord.com/games/elette/
